clues.text: Ireland celebrates this, March 17th, as a national holiday

The art of producing formal lettering with a brush or a pen

rounds.comments: (Ken: You'll need to name these words given their definition in Merriam-Webster's dictionary.)

rounds.text: Published in 2011, P.D. James' final novel, "Death Comes to Pemberley", was a sequel to this novel from 200 years earlier
